title: Is a music career really hard? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not at all in the field of music it is two way career first is you are trying to achieve internal peace and second is just opposite getting famous. To achieve among these two the common factor is being creative. Music is an art and art needs creativity, talent and experience by getting proper training under able guru one can become artist but if the artist lacks creativity then after some time people will get bored and this the most challenging work music throws at you to be creative. And perhaps the solid reason why it is very difficult as a career because very few people have such brain. Hope you got the answer

It depends on how much you enjoy it. The more you enjoy it, the easier it will feel. If you hate it, the harder it will feel. The more important question is: “Do I really want a music career?” If your answer is “Yes,” give it your all.
